revised_title: Transgenic Modification in Plants: Dissecting and Manipulating Plant Processes
tldr: The article discusses the use of transgenic plants in plant biology, highlighting various methods for gene isolation and manipulation. Transgenic plants have become a standard tool in experimental plant biology, allowing researchers to isolate and identify new plant genes, understand gene expression mechanisms, and examine the biological roles of cellular constituents.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
